attributes.action: George Osborne must stop his planned cuts on PIP, Personal Independence Payments
attributes.background: This is one step too far, George Osbourne has deprived so many individuals who rely on PIP. It's bad enough having to ask for help,  this money will add more pressure.  I call for Mr Osbourne to be big enough to apologies and state he has made a mistake and removed the planned cuts to PIP now
